I don't write many reviews but I shop and go out VERY frequently.
This place, these products should be known by ALL.
The ambiance, and the experience Miss Nef put into my visit was outstanding, comforting, knowledgeable and just funnnnnn.
I went a little ham on the products but ummm wait until you guys try them. That Rose in particular, the truly yummy dust and lube.. but let's just concentrate on Rose ( she's my new Bestie and I can see will be a wonderful teacher to those not exactly fully versed in the downtown area)

Cok fazla yorum yazmiyorum ama COK sik alisveris yapiyorum ve disari cikiyorum.
Burasinin, bu urunlerin HERKES tarafindan bilinmesi gerekiyor.
Bayan Nef'in ziyaretimdeki ortami ve deneyimi olaganustu, rahatlatici, bilgili ve eglenceliydi.
Urunlerde biraz jambon kullandim ama siz onlari deneyene kadar bekleyin. Ozellikle su Rose, gercekten lezzetli toz ve yag.. ama hadi sadece Rose'a odaklanalim (o benim yeni Bestie'm ve sehir merkezinde tam olarak bilgili olmayanlar icin harika bir ogretmen olacagini gorebiliyorum)
Oynamayi birakin, kontrol edin. Bu departmandaki cogu seyi bildigimi saniyordum, bilgi konusunda Bos bir ipucuyla iceri gir, boylece ogrenebilirsin ve icine girebilirsin.
Her acidan A+. Hala gulumsuyorum 
Evet burada her sey yolunda ova

featured_question.question:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Bir kadin olarak benimle oynayacak birini bulabilir miyim, yoksa bu sadece erkeklere ozel mi?

(Orijinal)
As a female, can I find someone to play with me, or is this only for men for men?
featured_question.answer:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Muhtemelen daha fazla gey erkek var ama muhtemelen iyi miktarda bi erkek ve bazi heteroseksuel erkekler var.

(Orijinal)
Probably more gay men but there's likely a good amount of bi guys and some straight guys

featured_reviews.review_id:
There is absolutely no parking for this location especially the Handicap. Next door to them there are handicap parking but they don't allow anyone if your not purchasing from their store. Is that legal?
Plus the picture they have on their website does not even match what the place looks like AND more important 75% of the booths are non  operational . Plus the cost is very high.
featured_reviews.review_text:
There is absolutely no parking for this location especially the Handicap. Next door to them there are handicap parking but they don't allow anyone if your not purchasing from their store. Is that legal?
Plus the picture they have on their website does not even match what the place looks like AND more important 75% of the booths are non  operational . Plus the cost is very high.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: This review is from our disgruntled neighbor who owns the smoke shop. Our landlord also rents to him; but he blames us for the lack of parking even though our mutual landlord gave us & our customers the right to park there. "G" located his business next to us because we have a lot of traffic. It is unfair and unethical to target us for this situation. Our store has been here for over 30 years dealing with the parking as best we can, while "G" has only recently located here. We have never publicly complained about anyone or blocked anyone from parking period; but now our customers are being blocked from parking in violation of our lease; everyday by "G" and his staff. There is absolutely no credibility to any of "G"'s claims regarding our booths or our prices. This is a simple case a man who did not properly investigate his location or negotiate his lease. The statement regarding handicap parking is also not true. I hope that Google will delete "G"'s post; but in the mean time; we vigorously regret that "G" has stooped so low as to put his mean and untruthful comments in a Google review and also that we have no other option than to vigorously refute these lies.
featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Bu konum icin ozellikle Engelliler icin kesinlikle park yeri yoktur. Yanlarinda engelli park yeri var ama magazalarindan alisveris yapmiyorsaniz kimseye izin vermiyorlar. Bu yasal mi?
Ustelik web sitelerindeki resimler mekanin neye benzedigiyle bile eslesmiyor VE daha da onemlisi stantlarin %75'i calismiyor. Ustelik maliyeti cok yuksek.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Bu inceleme, sigara dukkaninin sahibi olan hosnutsuz komsumuzdan geliyor. Ev sahibimiz de ona kira veriyor; ama ortak ev sahibimiz bize ve musterilerimize park etme hakkini vermis olmasina ragmen park yeri olmamasindan bizi sorumlu tutuyor. "G" trafigimiz cok oldugu icin isini yanimiza yerlestirdi. Bu durumdan dolayi bizi hedef almak haksizliktir ve etik degildir. Magazamiz 30 yili askin bir suredir otoparkla elimizden geldigince ilgileniyor, "G" ise yakin zamanda burada bulunuyor. Hicbir zaman kamuya acik bir sekilde kimse hakkinda sikayette bulunmadik veya kimsenin park etme suresini engellemedik; ama simdi musterilerimizin kira sozlesmemize aykiri olarak park etmeleri engelleniyor; "G" ve ekibi tarafindan her gun. "G"nin standlarimiz ve fiyatlarimizla ilgili iddialarinin hicbirinin kesinlikle inandiriciligi yoktur. Bu, yerini gerektigi gibi arastirmamis veya kira sozlesmesini muzakere etmeyen bir adamin basit bir davasidir. Engelli park yeri ile ilgili ifade de dogru degil. Umarim Google "G"nin gonderisini siler; Ama bu arada; "G"nin kotu niyetli ve asilsiz yorumlarini bir Google incelemesine koyacak kadar alcalmis olmasindan ve ayrica bu yalanlari siddetle curutmekten baska secenegimizin olmamasindan siddetle uzuntu duyuyoruz.

featured_reviews.review_id: There are 2 reasons I gave this place 1 star.. First because "No Stars" is not an option and second because the lady at the front registers was nice and friendly so she deserves something at least for that. Now the parking lot is extremely small so finding parking was a task. As we were walking up to the front door there were 3 different cars with men all jacking off in their cars.. well there would be more parking if they made those douche bags leave. After walking into the place I noticed it was extremely small, stuffy and smelled like urine so bad it made my stomach turn. I can't image how anyone would look forward to going here or working here for that matter. After a couple minutes we were beyond over this place and quickly left. This place was dirty, disgusting, stinky and way over priced.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review Regina. We will give some attention to those specific things. We appreciate your time to review us, one star or not.
featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Bu yere 1 yildiz vermemin 2 nedeni var.. Birincisi, "Yildiz Yok" bir secenek olmamasi, ikincisi ise on kayittaki bayanin iyi ve arkadas canlisi olmasi, bu yuzden en azindan bunun icin bir seyi hak etmesi. Artik park yeri son derece kucuk oldugundan park yeri bulmak bir isti. On kapiya dogru yururken 3 farkli araba vardi ve hepsi de arabalarinda otuzbir cekiyordu.. o salaklarin gitmesini saglasalardi daha fazla park yeri olurdu. Oraya yurudukten sonra, son derece kucuk, havasiz oldugunu ve midemi bulandiracak kadar kotu idrar koktugunu fark ettim. Birinin buraya gitmeyi veya bu konuda burada calismayi nasil sabirsizlikla bekleyecegini hayal bile edemiyorum. Birkac dakika sonra buranin otesine gectik ve hizla ayrildik. Burasi kirli, igrenc, pis kokulu ve fiyati cok yuksek bir yerdi.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Yorumun icin tesekkurler Regina. Bu spesifik seylere biraz dikkat edecegiz. Bir yildiz olsun ya da olmasin, bizi incelemek icin zaman ayirdiginiz icin tesekkur ederiz.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Had a horrible experience here with the night staff this past Saturday. Have been trying to reach an actual manager since but no luck. Not sure who to file a complaint with because they would not give their names. I enjoyed my first hour. A young lady came to check tickets and mine had just expired. I go to the counter to renew but the price is now $22 not the initial $15 I paid. I inquired about it and apparently hadn't been charged for one side on my first hour. Cool, I go to hand the clerk my card and he instead tells me to have a nice night?? I was very confused and at first thought it was a joke so I asked if he was serious. His response is yes I am refusing your service you need to leave now. Never once looking me in the face. So I ask what his name is and he tells me he doesn't have to tell me his name. Then I ask for the managers name and he said he is the manager. Before I could say anything else the young lady working with him tells me I'm making it worse and to get out. She also said that she would not let me in on her shift. Again, why all of that happened I'm completely dumbfounded. I drove over an hour to this place, and to be treated that nasty by staff with no explanation was probably one of the worst experiences I've ever had anywhere. If a manager sees this, please work with your night staff. I didn't cause problems for anyone. Only inquired about the price discrepancy and that was enough to be refused service. Not everyone lives in that area and it was personally only my 2nd time there.

UPDATE: reached out to management and they have turned this situation around. Thank you to Kim for reaching out to me and extending your hospitality to return back to the store! I really appreciate you taking the time like a good manager does to make a wrong, right!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Johnny, I am deeply sorry for any misunderstanding. If you will reply with the time (an estimate is fine); so we can look up who was on at that particular time; we can address it more directly with staff. Very sorry again that your visit did not meet your expectations.
Please call the store. Apparently you left your number but when the Mgr tried to call you today; it was not a correct number. Thank you Johnny.
featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Gecen Cumartesi gece personeli ile burada korkunc bir deneyim yasadim. O zamandan beri gercek bir yoneticiye ulasmaya calisiyorum ama sans yok. Isimlerini vermedikleri icin kime sikayette bulunacaklarindan emin degiller. Ilk saatimden keyif aldim. Biletleri kontrol etmeye genc bir bayan geldi ve benimkinin suresi yeni dolmustu. Yenilemek icin tezgaha gidiyorum ama fiyat simdi 22 dolar, odedigim ilk 15 dolar degil. Bunu sordum ve gorunuse gore ilk saatimde bir taraf icin ucret alinmamisti. Harika, memura kartimi vermeye gidiyorum ve onun yerine bana iyi geceler mi diyor? Kafam cok karisti ve ilk basta bunun bir saka oldugunu dusundum, bu yuzden ciddi olup olmadigini sordum. Cevabi evet, hizmetinizi reddediyorum, simdi gitmeniz gerekiyor. Yuzume bir kez bile bakma. Bu yuzden adinin ne oldugunu soruyorum ve bana adini soylemek zorunda olmadigini soyluyor. Sonra yoneticilerin adini soruyorum ve yonetici oldugunu soyledi. Baska bir sey soyleyemeden, onunla calisan genc bayan bana durumu daha da kotulestirdigimi ve gitmemi soyledi. Ayrica vardiyasinda beni iceri almayacagini soyledi. Yine, tum bunlar neden oldu, tamamen saskina dondum. Bu yere bir saatten fazla surdum ve hicbir aciklama yapilmadan personel tarafindan bu kadar kotu muamele gormek, muhtemelen simdiye kadar herhangi bir yerde yasadigim en kotu deneyimlerden biriydi. Bir yonetici bunu gorurse, lutfen gece personelinizle calisin. Kimseye sorun cikarmadim. Yalnizca fiyat tutarsizligini sordu ve bu, hizmetin reddedilmesi icin yeterliydi. Herkes o bolgede yasamiyor ve sahsen orada sadece 2. zamanimdi.

GUNCELLEME: yonetime ulasti ve bu durumu tersine cevirdiler. Bana ulastiginiz ve magazaya geri donmek icin misafirperverliginizi gosterdiginiz icin Kim'e tesekkur ederim! Iyi bir menajerin yanlis yapmak icin yaptigi gibi zaman ayirdiginiz icin gercekten minnettarim!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text:
Johnny, herhangi bir yanlis anlasilmadan dolayi cok uzgunum. Zamaniyla birlikte cevap verirseniz (bir tahmin iyidir); boylece belirli bir zamanda kimin acik olduguna bakabiliriz; Bu sorunu personelle daha dogrudan cozebiliriz. Ziyaretinizin beklentilerinizi karsilamamasindan dolayi tekrar cok uzgunuz.
Lutfen magazayi arayin. Gorunuse gore numarani unutmussun ama bugun Mgr seni aramaya calistiginda; dogru bir sayi degildi. Tesekkur ederim Johnny.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Aslinda hic gitmedim, yalnizca gece yarisi birden fazla kez cesitli yetiskin magazalarina dogru yola ciktim ama her zaman o kadar kalabalik gorunuyor ki korkutucu oluyor. Yine de duydugum kadariyla burasi muhtesem ve ziyaret etmeye kararliyim. Ben Long Beach'ten super harika bir siyah trans kadinim ve hos karsilanacagimdan emin degilim. Temiz olan her sey ilgimi cekiyor, bu yuzden dogal olarak oyuncak magazasini sik sik ziyaret ediyorum. Bir bayanla tanismak isterdim ya da bu arada sadece paylasmayi seven insanlarla... Ya da en azindan ugrasmadan alisveris yapmak
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Korkmana gerek yok Leisha. Incelemelerimizi okuyun... Biz dost canlisi, tehdit edici olmayan bir ortamiz. Herhangi bir sorun; lutfen gorevli calisanla konusun veya Ekip Liderini isteyin. Senin icin buradayiz!

featured_reviews.review_id: While this shop has plenty to select from... I'll never go back nor will I recommend this establishment to anyone. If customer service is important to you.. don't waste your time here. Short version of my experience. I've made purchases at this location for some years, enough to be familiar with their management. My last purchase was supposedly tested and should have worked. Got it charged and to my surprise it didn't operate at all. I took it back and was greeted by the most uneducated, rude employees I've ever encountered. The young lady made a poor assumption that i did t have a receipt, she didn't give me an opportunity to thoroughly share my experience when i made the purchase. I asked for mangemt and she refused to provide their information. I have an item that was severely over priced and non operable. Never again.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Bu magazanin secebilecegi cok sey olsa da... Bir daha asla geri donmeyecegim ve bu isletmeyi kimseye tavsiye etmeyecegim. Musteri hizmetleri sizin icin onemliyse burada zamaninizi bosa harcamayin. Deneyimimin kisa versiyonu. Birkac yildir bu yerden, yonetimlerini tanimaya yetecek kadar alisveris yaptim. Son satin alma islemimin sozde test edildigi ve calismasi gerekiyordu. Sarj ettirdim ve sasirtici bir sekilde hic calismadi. Onu geri aldim ve simdiye kadar karsilastigim en egitimsiz, kaba calisanlar tarafindan karsilandim. Genc bayan, faturamin olmadigi konusunda kotu bir varsayimda bulundu ve satin alma islemini yaptigimda bana deneyimimi tam olarak paylasma firsati vermedi. Mangemt istedim ve bilgilerini vermeyi reddetti. Fiyati cok yuksek olan ve calistirilamayan bir urunum var. Bir daha asla.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hands-down one of the best most reasonably priced adult stores I have ever been to. Each location I have had the opportunity to visit I'm blown away by their products and price consistency and quite frankly the products sold in this establishment far exceed any Hustler store any other adult clothing store that I can think of off the top of my head.
The reason for the four stars, The only problem with this particular store I found to be, the employees. They seemed Far too busy eating their dinner behind the counter and or talking on their cellular phones. A quick trip that should've been less than 15 minutes took 45. I would work on the customer service that is for sure. Or serious lack there of.
To that end, the product line is extensive the queen size section is comparable to the spinner girl section with the intention of everybody should look and feel sexy. I really appreciate this particular establishment and all of its locations I've been to.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Simdiye kadar bulundugum en iyi en uygun fiyatli yetiskin magazalarindan biri. Ziyaret etme firsati buldugum her yer, urunleri ve fiyat tutarliligi karsisinda saskina dondum ve acikcasi bu kurulusta satilan urunler, aklima gelen herhangi bir Hustler magazasini, diger yetiskin giyim magazalarini cok asiyor. .
Dort yildizin nedeni, bu magazanin tek sorununun calisanlar oldugunu buldum. Tezgahin arkasinda aksam yemegini yemekle ya da cep telefonlariyla konusmakla fazlasiyla mesgul gorunuyorlardi. 15 dakikadan kisa surmesi gereken kisa bir yolculuk 45 dakika surdu. Musteri hizmetleri uzerinde calisacagim kesindi. Ya da ciddi bir eksiklik var.
Bu amacla, urun yelpazesi genistir, kralice beden bolumu, herkesin seksi gorunmesi ve hissetmesi amaciyla donen kiz bolumuyle karsilastirilabilir. Bu ozel kurulusu ve bulundugum tum konumlarini gercekten takdir ediyorum.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Cok hayal kirikligina ugramis! Ilk once birkac saatten fazla dayanmayan bir urun almamla basladi! Sorunu aciklamak icin magazayi aradim ve sikayet etmeye hakkim yokmus gibi muamele gordu. Yuz dolardan fazla harcadim, bu nedenle sikayet etme hakkim var. Ikinci olarak, baska bir urun hakkinda soru sormak icin aradim ve telefonu kapattim. Ondan sonra kimse telefona cevap vermiyordu. Oturup isini yapmayan bu Tembel calisanlar, bir isletmenin sayginligini ve imajini zedeleyen kisilerdir. Sahipler, lutfen isletmenizi kontrol edin. Asla geri donmeyecegim ve bilgileri baskalarina iletecegim. Tuketici olarak daha iyisini hak ediyoruz.
